text: The 2019–20 Drexel Dragons women's basketball team represents Drexel University during the 2019–20 NCAA Division I women's basketball season. The Dragons, led by seventeenth-year head coach Denise Dillon, play their home games at the Daskalakis Athletic Center in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania as members of the Colonial Athletic Association. ==Previous season== ==Offseason== ===Departures=== {| class="wikitable sortable" border="1" !
